      • moveEntity

        public void moveEntity(org.spongepowered.api.entity.Entity entity,
                       com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3d newLocation,
                       float rotation)
        Moves the Entity to the Location in the World that the Entity currently resides in and applies the Rotation to the Entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to be moved.
        newLocation - Vector3d location to move the Entity to.
        rotation - New Rotation of the Entity.

                        Rotation rotation)
        Rotates the Craft around the Location using the Rotation.
        Parameters:
        craft - Craft to be rotated.
        originPoint - Vector3i that the Craft will be rotated around.
        rotation - Rotation tha the Craft will be rotated by.

        Moves the Craft using the Vector3i.
        Parameters:
        craft - Craft to be moved.
        translateBlockVector - 3D direction that the Craft is to be moved in.
        newHitBox - New HitBox of the Craft after moving.
